weather: Check forecast - travel day to mountains
description: Shrine-hopping adventure through Tokyo for goshuin collection, then departing for Mount Fuji area. Multiple beautiful shrines in Harajuku/Shibuya area before traveling to Kawaguchiko for ryokan stay.

activities.description: Leave Airbnb and walk to Ebisu Station
Travel to Shinjuku: JR Yamanote Line from Ebisu Station (inner loop, 2 stops north) - 10-15 mins, ~¬•170
Arrive at Shinjuku Station and drop off bags in coin locker or luggage storage
Travel from Shinjuku Station to Harajuku Station (JR Yamanote Line, 1 stop south)
Visit Meiji Shrine (Meiji Jingu) - walk through serene forest path to main complex. Get goshuin at this prestigious shrine. [üìñ Shrine Guide](https://jinja-gosyuin.com/meijijingu/)
Visit Togo-jinja Shrine - quiet atmosphere and lovely garden, short walk from Meiji Shrine
Lunch in Harajuku/Shibuya - explore Omotesando, Cat Street, or backstreets of Harajuku

Visit Onden Shrine (Á©èÁî∞Á•ûÁ§æ) - quiet local shrine tucked away from main streets, 10-15 min walk from Harajuku area. Beautiful goshuin available. [üìñ Shrine Guide](https://jinja-gosyuin.com/ondenjinja-gosyuin/)
Visit Kitaya Inari Shrine (ÂåóË∞∑Á®≤Ëç∑Á•ûÁ§æ) - small oasis of calm in bustling area, 15-20 min walk from Onden
Visit Miyamasumitake Shrine (ÂÆÆÁõäÂæ°Â∂ΩÁ•ûÁ§æ) - short walk towards Shibuya Station, right in heart of city
Head to Shinjuku Station via nearby Shibuya Station (JR Yamanote line, 1 stop north)
Arrive at Shinjuku Station and retrieve your luggage

üöÑ Depart ≈åtsuki Station: Fujisan View Express 13 (Fujikyuko Line)
Travel to ryokan: Take short taxi ride (5-10 minutes) from the station
Check into Aoiso Ryokan („ÅÇ„Åä„ÅÑËçò) - 1297-1 Kodachi, Fujikawaguchiko, Minamitsuru District, Yamanashi 401-0302

transportation: JR Yamanote Line (¬•170 per trip), Limited Express Kaiji + Fujisan View Express to Kawaguchiko, taxi to ryokan
accommodation: Aoiso Ryokan („ÅÇ„Åä„ÅÑËçò) - 1297-1 Kodachi, Fujikawaguchiko, Minamitsuru District, Yamanashi 401-0302
meals: Breakfast: Light meal before departure, Lunch: Harajuku/Omotesando restaurants, Dinner: Traditional ryokan kaiseki
budget: ¬•15,000 - ¬•25,000 (includes train tickets ¬•3,000+, shrine donations, meals, taxi, ryokan)
notes: GOSHUIN COLLECTION DAY! Bring your goshuincho from Ebisu Shrine. Check shrine guides for Meiji Shrine and Onden Shrine for goshuin details and photos. Shrine addresses: Onden (5-26-6 Jingumae), Kitaya Inari (1-4-1 Jinnan), Miyamasumitake (1-12-16 Shibuya). Store luggage at Shinjuku early. Traditional ryokan experience begins! üö® CRITICAL TRAIN: Limited Express Kaiji 35 at 15:30 from Platform 10 - MUST NOT MISS! This is the last train to Mount Fuji today.
